snippet.title: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun - Forges Of Corruption DLC Reveal Trailer | Skulls 2024
snippet.description:
Take a look at this trailer for Warhammer 40k: Boltgun that was revealed at the Warhammer Skulls 2024 event.

Forges of Corruption arrives June 18th - along with a new Edition for newcomers - on PlayStation, Xbox and PC.

Explore new environments and stop Chaos corruption before it engulfs the entire world of Graia! Exterminate new enemies face the monstrous Helbrute, the heavy weapon-wielding Havoc, and the vicious lightning claws of the Terminator. Purge with new weapons: Burn hordes of heretics with your Multi-melta or blow them away with the Missile Launcher.

#Warhammer #WarhammerSkulls
